item.description:
Understand some of the gender differences that tend to cause havoc in relationship and ways to respond to the other gender in ways that work.

7:30-9:30pm, $40, sliding scale if needed $40 to $20

Herb Pearce is a personality types expert, particularly with the Enneagram and Myers-Briggs. He also taught gender dynamics workshops for many years. He is a therapist for individuals, couples and families, a personal coach and is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram, Herb's Tips for Living and soon to be Enneagram for Advanced Students.


781 648 3737, www.herbpearce.com, herb@herbpearce.com

Â
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.name: Gender Differences and Ways to Bridge the Gap
